Bank Transfers

Secure, Efficient Giving

Thank you for your interest in giving to the Dagogo Pollyn Foundation with your checking or savings accountâ€”this saves the Foundation administrative time and resources, so more of your gift will go straight to work!

Online Transfer

To give online with your bank account, visit dagogopollyn.org/donate, choose your giving frequency (monthly or one-time), select "bank transfer," and follow the remaining steps on our secure donation page.

Donate Online Now
Mail-in Transfer

To give via mail with your bank account, please print our Mail-in Donation Form or enclose the requested information. For monthly donations, include a voided check.

Download Form

Secure Transactions

All electronic transfers are processed through secure banking channels. For additional security, we recommend verifying account details with our finance team before transferring large amounts.
